name: PublishingService
description: Use the methods in the KbManagement.PublishingService class to manage the lifecycle of an article and its translations.

archiveonlinearticle(string,datetime).name: archiveOnlineArticle
archiveonlinearticle(string,datetime).signature: public static void archiveOnlineArticle(String articleId, Datetime scheduledDate)
archiveonlinearticle(string,datetime).description: Archives an online version of an article. If the specified scheduledDate is null, the article is archived immediately. Otherwise, it archives the article on the scheduled date.

assigndraftarticletask(string,string,str.name: assignDraftArticleTask
assigndraftarticletask(string,string,str.signature: public static void assignDraftArticleTask(String articleId, String assigneeId, String instructions, Datetime dueDate, Boolean sendEmailNotification)
assigndraftarticletask(string,string,str.description: Assigns a review task related to a draft article.

assigndrafttranslationtask(string,string.name: assignDraftTranslationTask
assigndrafttranslationtask(string,string.signature: public static void assignDraftTranslationTask(String articleVersionId, String assigneeId, String instructions, Datetime dueDate, Boolean sendEmailNotification)
assigndrafttranslationtask(string,string.description: Assigns a review task related to a draft translation.

cancelscheduledarchivingofarticle(string.name: cancelScheduledArchivingOfArticle
cancelscheduledarchivingofarticle(string.description: Cancels the scheduled archiving of an online article.

cancelscheduledpublicationofarticle(stri.name: cancelScheduledPublicationOfArticle
cancelscheduledpublicationofarticle(stri.description: Cancels the scheduled publication of a draft article.

completetranslation(string).name: completeTranslation
completetranslation(string).description: Puts a translation in a completed state that is ready to publish.

deletearchivedarticleversion(string,inte.name: deleteArchivedArticleVersion
deletearchivedarticleversion(string,inte.signature: public static void deleteArchivedArticleVersion(String articleId, Integer versionNumber)
deletearchivedarticleversion(string,inte.description: Deletes a specific version of an archived article.

editarchivedarticle(string).name: editArchivedArticle
editarchivedarticle(string).description: Creates a draft article from the archived master version and returns the new draft master version ID of the article.

editonlinearticle(string,boolean).name: editOnlineArticle
editonlinearticle(string,boolean).signature: public static String editOnlineArticle(String articleId, Boolean unpublish)
editonlinearticle(string,boolean).description: Creates a draft article from the online version and  returns the new draft master version ID of the article. Also, unpublishes the online article, if unpublish is set to true.

editpublishedtranslation(string,string,b.name: editPublishedTranslation
editpublishedtranslation(string,string,b.signature: public static String editPublishedTranslation(String articleId, String language, Boolean unpublish)
editpublishedtranslation(string,string,b.description: Creates a draft version of the online translation for a specific language and returns the new draft master version ID of the article. Also, unpublishes the article, if set to true.

publisharticle(string,boolean).name: publishArticle
publisharticle(string,boolean).signature: public static void publishArticle(String articleId, Boolean flagAsNew)
publisharticle(string,boolean).description: Publishes an article. If flagAsNew is set to true, the article is published as a major version.

restoreoldversion(string,integer).name: restoreOldVersion
restoreoldversion(string,integer).signature: public static String restoreOldVersion(String articleId, Integer versionNumber)
restoreoldversion(string,integer).description: Creates a draft article from an existing online article based on the specified archived version of the article and returns the article version ID.

scheduleforpublication(string,datetime).name: scheduleForPublication
scheduleforpublication(string,datetime).signature: public static void scheduleForPublication(String articleId, Datetime scheduledDate)
scheduleforpublication(string,datetime).description: Schedules the article for publication as a major version. If the specified date is null, the article is published immediately.

settranslationtoincomplete(string).name: setTranslationToIncomplete
settranslationtoincomplete(string).description: Sets a draft translation that is ready for publication back to “in progress” status.

submitfortranslation(string,string,strin.name: submitForTranslation
submitfortranslation(string,string,strin.signature: public static String submitForTranslation(String articleId, String language, String assigneeId, Datetime dueDate)
submitfortranslation(string,string,strin.description: Submits an article for translation to the specified language. Also assigns the specified user and due date to the submittal and returns new ID of the draft translation.
